---
title: 树莓派之OTP
date: 2018-03-03 13:21:12
tags:
	- 树莓派

---



OTG是One Time Programmable的缩写。一次性编程。

只能改一次。

1、读取otp信息。

```
pi@raspberrypi:~$ sudo vcgencmd otp_dump
08:00000000
09:00000000
10:00000000
11:00000000
12:00000000
13:00000000
14:00000000
15:00000000
16:00280000
17:3020000a
18:3020000a
19:ffffffff
20:ffffffff
21:ffffffff
22:ffffffff
23:ffffffff
24:ffffffff
25:ffffffff
26:ffffffff
27:00002727
28:5e004eca
29:a1ffb135
30:00a22082
31:00000000
32:00000000
33:00000000
34:00000000
35:00000000
36:00000000
37:00000000
38:00000000
39:00000000
40:00000000
41:00000000
42:00000000
43:00000000
44:00000001
45:00000000
46:00000000
47:00000000
48:00000000
49:00000000
50:00000000
51:00000000
52:00000000
53:00000000
54:00000000
55:00000000
56:00000000
57:00000000
58:00000000
59:00000000
60:00000000
61:00000000
62:00000000
63:00000000
64:00000000
65:00000000
66:00009daa
```

28是硬件序列化。30是修订版本。
